name: Gold Piece
description:
Game made for Mini jam 85 : gold hosted by 

Hosted by ZahranW, KingW, ManuGamesDev

This is only my Second Jam so feel free to send me  my fair of criticism.

Entirety of asset made within the 3 days duration of the game Jam.

Only asset not made by me is the audio made by my good friend David Malenfant https://goruku.itch.io/.
